commands.help [name of command]: Retrieves a list of all commands & other useful information.
commands.rating [username & tag]: Retrieves the user's rating. Will enter the user into the database if not already.
commands.match <winner username & tag> <loser use: Records the results of a match into the database. Will enter the user into the database if not already.
commands.winrate [username & tag]: Retrieves the user's winrate. Will enter the user into the database if not already.
commands.matchmake: Will initiate the matchmaking process in this channel.

secrets.set [username & tag] <value>: Sets a user's rating to a specified value. Not specifying will default to affecting the sender of the message only. For Dev user only.
secrets.reset [username & tag or the word 'globa: Resets a user's rating or the entire database if given the option. Not specifying will default to affecting the sender of the message only. For Dev use only.
secrets.undo [username & tag] [number of undos t: (WIP do not test) Undoes the last x change(s) to the user's rating. Not specifying will default to affecting the sender of the message only. Ajusts various other variables in the process. For Dev use only.
secrets.purge [username & tag] [number of purges: (WIP do not test) Purges the history of a user x times. Not specifying will default to affecting the sender of the message only. Ajusts various other variables in the process. For Dev use only.
secrets.config [component] [value]: (WIP do not test) Will query either a specific or all components in the server's config. If a value is specified it will set the component to that value. For Dev use only.

components.rating: Whether or not to use the rating system. (Default: TRUE).
components.matchmaker: Whether or not to use the matchmaking system. (Default: TRUE).
components.min_players: How many players are required to play this game. (Default: 2)
components.max_players: The maximum number of players able to play in one game. (Default: 2)
components.match_wait: How many minutes the bot will wait for a match with the matchmaker. (Default: 5)
